summary: A mod that changes vanilla housecarls.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/6ifuNwT.png[/img]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=6]INTRODUCTION:[/SIZE][/FONT]

[SIZE=3]Aren't you tired of the same type of housecarl? In vanilla game, they are the same, wielding a sword and a shield, but different in voice and gender. This mods aims to change this, modifying the armors and weapons that they use: [/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]Lydia wears an iron armor, because she is very easy to obtain as a follower. [/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]On the other hand, Jordis wears a set of ebony armor, because the process to get him as a follower is harder.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=2]
[/SIZE]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=6]WHAT THIS MOD DOES:[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=2]• Changes the housecarls's weapons and armor, for more [/SIZE][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]unique followers.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]• Changes their playstyle.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]• Balance those armors and weapons for more rewarding thane naming [/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2](or not!)[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2].[/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]
• Removes male animations on female housecarls.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]• Changes physical atributes.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]• Tweak a bit the way they react to crimes, and combat.[/SIZE][/FONT]
[FONT=Arial][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/FONT]
[SIZE=6][FONT=Impact]WHAT THIS MOD DOESN'T:[/FONT][/SIZE]
[FONT=Impact][SIZE=2]
[/SIZE][/FONT]
• Changes the way the housecarls look.
• Makes female looks like bitches.
• Makes they too overpowered.
• Creates new housecarls.
• Changes animations.

[SIZE=6][FONT=Impact]CHANGES:[/FONT][/SIZE]

[color=Goldenrod][b]Lydia:[/color] Steel Armor to Iron Banded Armor.[/b]
[color=Green][b]Argis the Bulwark:[/color] Steel Armor to Orcish Armor. Now wields a Orcish Warhammer.[/b]
[color=Red][b]Jordis the Sword-Maiden:[/color] Steel Armor to Ebony Armor. Now wields a Ebony Greatsword.[/b]
[color=mediumpurple][b]Iona:[/color] Steel Armor to Scaled Armor. Now uses a bow.[/b]
[color=dodgerblue][b]Calder:[/color] Steel Armor to Dwarven Armor. Now wields a Dwarven Battleaxe.[/b]

[SIZE=6][FONT=Impact]INSTALATION:[/FONT][/SIZE]

• Download the .esp file.
• Drag the .esp to your Data folder, inside Skyrim folder.
• Open Skyrim Launcher, and click on Data Files, and be sure that "Unique Housecarls" is marked.

[SIZE=6][FONT=Impact]PLANS:[/FONT][/SIZE]

• Make at least one mage housecarl.
• Nerf Jordis the Sword-Maiden.

*Needs the last Skyrim update*
[SIZE=3]This mod may be incompatible with other similar mods. It's compatible with Amazing Followers Tweaks, and I recommend using it.[/SIZE]
[SIZE=3]Send me feedback. Feel free to send me comments or PMs, whatever.[/SIZE]

Known Issues:
[s]Jordis and Lydia can't be hired as follower.[/s] FIXED
[s]Housecarls are naked[/s] FIXED

Changelog:
1.3 - All housecarls now follow.
1.2 - Naked housecarls fixed
1.1 - Calder and Argis height fixed
1.0 - Initial release
[size=4]ALL HAIL TO BIOHAZARD186, YOU ARE HIGH-KING![/size]
Many thanks for the Screenshots =]

author: Spr1t3
